GEOLOCATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: Il nostro accesso è stato negato. Hai approvato la richiesta di accesso alla tua posizione ?
GEOLOCATION_POSITION_UNAVAILABLE: We couldn't get your position. Is your GPS activated ?
REQUESTS_EMPTY_DISCLAIMER: Più persone sane aiutano, meglio è. Aggiungi i tuoi amici e dai una mano.
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_TITLE_NEEDER: Il supporto sarà fornito da qualcuno nel tuo vicinato
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_TITLE_HELPER: Qualcuno nel tuo vicinato ha bisogno di supporto.
INTRO_TITLE: Thank you for making an impact
SIGNIN_TITLE: Please sign up with your favorite social login
CONSENTS_TITLE: I agree with the following statements at this moment and for any future use of the app
CONSENTS_SYMPTOMS: I am not showing any symptoms of COVID-19 (coughing, fever, shortness of breath, etc.).
CONSENTS_TRAVEL: I have not travelled out of the country in the past 14 days.
CONSENTS_CONTACT: I have not come in contact with anyone suspected of being infected or sick in the past 14 days.
CONSENTS_SOCIAL: I have been practicing social distancing.
PROFILE_SETUP_TITLE: We just need a few things to set you up.
PROFILE_SETUP_HELPER_TITLE: Thank you for helping your local community.
PROFILE_SETUP_TERMS_CONFIRM: I have read and agree with the terms of service
PROFILE_SETUP_PRIVACY_POLICY_CONFIRM: I understand and consent to the collection and use of my personal information, including my Health Data, as described in the Privacy Policy
PROFILE_NAME_TITLE: Please enter your first and last name
SPONSORS_REACH_OUT: Reach out if your company can help.
